articles.title: Realme plans to bring the Realme X7 5G to India next year - XDA Developers
articles.description: Realme announced plans to bring the 5G-capable Realme X7 series to India in 2021, despite there being no 5G network in the country.
articles.content: Earlier this year, Realme launched the Realme X50 Pro in India, its first 5G smartphone in that market. The company is now committing to launch more 5G devices in the country, with plans to democrati… [+1866 chars]

articles.title: AirPods Pro vs. Galaxy Buds Live: Sound quality, noise cancellation compared - CNET
articles.description: Can Samsung's Galaxy "Beans" beat Apple's standard bearer, the AirPods Pro?
articles.content: With good sound quality, excellent active noise canceling and a compact design, Apple's AirPods Pro set the tone for premium wireless earbuds. But Samsung may be giving its rival a run for its money.… [+7106 chars]

articles.title: The Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Pro receives a new MIUI 12 update in Europe; Global upgrade for all Redmi Note 8 handsets will be ready next month - Notebookcheck.net
